profile.title: Profile
profile.profileSubtitle: Manage your orders and account details. Your entire laser cutting history is always at your fingertips.
profile.activeOrdersInfo: Orders that are currently in progress.
profile.profileAndContactsInfo: Update your personal details, email address and telephone number for order communications.
profile.changePasswordRecommendation: We recommend using a complex password: at least 8 characters, upper and lower case letters, numbers and special characters.

hero.title: Need Laser Cutting?
hero.description: We'll do everything for you. Upload your design, choose the material — we'll handle the rest. Fast, precise, and with delivery.

custom.title: Didn't find what you were looking for? Order a unique product online
custom.description: Create a custom order according to your requirements

competitivePrices.title: Competitive Prices
competitivePrices.description: We offer the best price-to-quality ratio.

orderManagement.title: Order Management
orderManagement.description: Efficient management and support of customer orders at all stages.

programDevelopment.title: Control Program Development
programDevelopment.description: You don't need to worry about the technical side: our team fully handles the development.

productionControl.title: Production Task Management and Control
productionControl.description: Full control over production tasks and real-time monitoring of all processes.

support.title: Support at Every Stage
support.description: All tasks are controlled and managed, ensuring high quality and timely completion.

analytics.title: Clear reporting and analytics
analytics.description: You can always see the status of work, deadlines, and results. Complete transparency at every stage.

application.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what you need to manufacture. Specify dimensions, material, quantity and other details.
application.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
application.catalogProductInfo: Application is created based on a catalog product

order.title: Order
order.cannotSendToCompleted: Cannot send messages to completed orders

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Professional laser cutting of metal and other materials
about.whoWeAreText: LaserWorks is a modern manufacturing company specializing in laser cutting of metal, plastic and other materials. We have been in the market for over 10 years and have earned a reputation as a reliable partner for hundreds of clients.
about.ourMissionText: We strive to provide our clients with high-quality laser cutting services using modern equipment and advanced technologies. Our goal is to make the ordering process as simple and convenient as possible, and the result — exceeding expectations.
about.advantage1: Modern equipment and technologies for precise cutting
about.advantage2: Experienced team of specialists with years of experience
about.advantage4: Strict quality control at all stages of production
about.advantage5: Flexible cooperation terms and competitive prices

discounts.title: Discounts and Promotions
discounts.subtitle: Great offers for our customers
discounts.currentPromotionText: When ordering 10 or more items — 15% discount on the entire order! Promotion valid until the end of the month.
discounts.bulkOrderText: For orders of 50 or more items, we provide discounts up to 20% depending on volume and order complexity.
discounts.regularCustomerText: Our regular customers enjoy a special discount system. The more orders, the more benefits — up to 25%.
discounts.firstOrderText: New customers receive a 10% discount on their first order. This is a great opportunity to evaluate the quality of our services.
discounts.step1: Place an order through our website or contact us by phone
discounts.step2: Enter the promo code when placing an order (if applicable)
discounts.step3: The discount will be automatically applied when the order is confirmed
discounts.questionsText: Our managers are ready to answer all your questions and help you choose the best offer.

legal.title: For Legal Entities
legal.subtitle: Corporate solutions for business
legal.cooperationText: We offer favorable terms of cooperation for companies, individual entrepreneurs and organizations. We work with legal entities on a contract basis, providing all necessary documents for accounting.
legal.advantage1: Contract work with full package of documents
legal.paymentText: We offer various payment methods for the convenience of our corporate clients:
legal.paymentMethod2: Payment by contract with payment deferral
legal.paymentMethod3: Prepayment and post-payment depending on contract terms
legal.deliveryText: We organize delivery of finished products in Saint Petersburg and Leningrad Region. For other regions, shipping via transport companies is possible. Delivery cost is calculated individually.
legal.documentsText: We provide a complete package of documents: contracts, invoices, work completion certificates, delivery notes, invoices. All documents are issued in accordance with the requirements of Russian legislation.
legal.contactText: To discuss cooperation terms and receive a commercial proposal, please contact our corporate clients department.
